Replace.Text: Prosperity: Get extra [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] boost for every three cities you own, every city you build provides +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value +2 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value [NewLine][ NewLine] Industrious: Plots with improved facilities get +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, quarries and mines get +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, mines get +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production +2 if they are adjacent to luxury resources [ICON_GOLD]Gold coins, farms get +1[ICON_FOOD]food adjacent to other farms get extra+1[ICON_FOOD]food, and builders get extra labor for construction[NewLine][NewLine]Gold: return from each trade route[ICON_TradeRoute ] to get extra +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, and every time you build a city, you will get extra [ICON_Gold] gold coins according to the current gold coin holdings
True Monarch of Mountains and Waters
Yi Xiao Dao Tian Zhen Jun

Minzhi: Every time a technology is completed, all cities will be provided with 1% [ICON_Science] technology value bonus, 1% [ICON_Food] food bonus, and 1% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity bonus; every time a municipality is completed, all cities will be provided with 1% [ICON_CULTURE] culture value bonus, 1% [ICON_Gold] gold coin bonus, 1% [ICON_FAITH] faith bonus [NewLine] Xianhui: Guili set each city gets an extra 25% [ICON_GreatPerson] great man points, [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] relic It will provide +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, +3 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, +3 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, and provide seven additional relic slots for the capital. Get three items each of [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration [NewLine][NewLine] Floating Dust: When the final combat unit fights with units outside the territory -7[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power, the construction of combat units reduces -50%[ ICON_PRODUCTION]Production[NewLine]Sanddust: All units in non-territory -1 vision range -1 at the beginning of the round [ICON_MOVEMENT]Movement force, invalid after completing civics and theology[NewLine]Stardust: final long-distance units +1[ ICON_Ranged]Range[NewLine][NewLine]Aspect of Immovable Profound Stone: After constructing the characteristic area Ending God Skeleton, Floating Dust and Star Dust will be invalidated, Immortal Wisdom and Divine Wisdom will be invalid, all units +10[ICON_STRENGTH]combat power, +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] mobility, no loss of combat power due to damage, a free promotion for newly trained units and maintenance cost -5, +150% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity for military units built from separate sets, -50% war weariness , -80% [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, -80% [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, -40% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity
People's Wisdom, Immortal Wisdom, God's Wisdom[NewLine] Floating Dust, Sand Dust, Stardust[NewLine] The Aspect of Immovable Black Stone

A powerful melee unit, which can be promoted to use the rhythm to buff the surrounding friendly allies or cause damage to the surrounding enemies. Each promotion will give a relic in the capital with the music of the dust bell. After completing all promotions, you can perform a "absolute string" to deal a devastating blow to surrounding enemies

Powerful long-distance unit, each promotion will place a final machine on the spot, and after its promotion, all final machines will be given 15 experience points, and gold coins can be spent to arrange final machines after all promotions are completed
A powerful long-range unit, difficult to move, a sharp weapon for defense, and will get an additional [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power bonus as the technology is unlocked

"In the end, I was defeated by those who came, and died in the battle. When I and Gechen arrived, in the ruins... only the remains of my old friends remained." After the construction of [NewLine], it will cause irreversible impact.
"Now that I am away from the people, we all live and work in peace and contentment, and almost return to our hometown together. It is better to return to Liyuan in the name."
Returning to Liji, there are rumors of immortals, protecting one side.

The inhabitants of this land once faced raging waves as high as mountains, and were awakened in their beds and sleep by tsunami shaking the center of the earth; these fears have disappeared with peace and time. [NewLine] But it doesn't matter. Even if the long-sleeping Demon God wakes up again, it cannot prevent the coming of a new era.

Immortals are powerful, you can still move after attacking, you can still attack after moving, regardless of the loss of land movement power, you can get extra technology or culture after fighting, and you can get +7 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power when fighting with barbarians
Keeping pace with the times, immortals will gain +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power every time they go through an era
Immortal +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power in classical era
Immortal +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength in the Middle Ages
Immortals in the industrial age +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Immortals +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power in modern times
Immortals in the atomic age +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Immortals in the information age +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Higher-end materials, more superb skills, and the final machine will get additional combat power after the completion of the specified technology.
Copper Smelting: Final Machine +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength
Iron Smelting: Final Machine +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Power
Military Industry: Final Machine +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Power
Metal Casting: Final Machine +4 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength
Scientific theory: Final machine +4 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Steam Power: Final Machine +4 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Power
Nuclear fission: Final machine +6 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Synthetic material: final machine +6 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Composite materials: final machine +8 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Nuclear Fusion: Final Machine +8 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Power
Immortal magic, +7 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power against barbarians
+5 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power for self and friendly units around
+2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement for self and friendly units around
Provides additional healing to self and friendly units
Causes 10 points of fixed damage to surrounding units every round

After all, the true king of Gechenlang City lost his soulmate, +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power, +2 movement power [ICON_MOVEMENT], +1 attack times, +75% siege bonus for himself and friendly units around him, Killing a unit restores mobility, resets attack and restores 10 health points, and has a chance to crit
Using higher-end technology and materials, +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Equipped with sights, +1 [ICON_Ranged] attack range, +2 sight range and can see invisible units

Using higher-end technology and materials, causing a fixed 10 points of damage, and can attack again after killing the unit, but because of the excessive power, it will overload and cause non-fatal 20 points of damage to itself
Using higher-end technology and materials, an additional attack can be performed

Using higher-end technology and materials, each point of unused movement power gives it +3 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power, and +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power (the extra movement power is invalid for the final machine)
Using higher-end technology and materials, +5[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power, +10[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power when attacking the area
Mechanism Gathering Potential: Each point of unused [ICON_MOVEMENT] mobility provides +3 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Mechanism·Meteor: Extra +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power in the attack area
Rhythm·Brave: Zhenjun Gechenlang City +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Power for the whole body and own units
Rhythm·Fear: Zhenjun of Gechenlang City makes local units around him -5 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
Juexian: It's hard to find a soulmate. +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength
Aspect of Fudo Black Stone: Liyue's military units gain +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength
Absolute String: Deals 100 damage to the surrounding units and restores 100 HP for itself
Deploy an end machine: Spend 10%+100 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins to deploy an end machine on the spot
Dust: Affected by the power of the Demon God of Dust, outside the country -1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement -1 field of vision
Stardust: Protected by the Demon God of Dust, the unit that returns to the collection gets an extra +1 [ICON_RANGED] range
Floating Dust: Combat power -7 [ICON_STRENGTH] for units returning to and away from the unit fighting with units outside the country, and it will be invalid after having the end of the world.
Floating Dust: Combat power -7 [ICON_STRENGTH] for units returning to and away from the unit fighting with units outside the country, and it will be invalid after having the end of the world.
